title: Psychosocial Adjustment to Stigma among Young Adults with Chronic Visible Skin Disease
abstract: Skin diseases are the fourth leading cause of non-fatal disease burden worldwide and have high comorbidity with mental illness. Moreover, people with chronic visible skin disease are often stigmatized because of their skin. Visible stigma may be …
